name: Théodule
description:
Théodule is an epic car partygame where you will have to survive the attacks of Théodule, an evil baby trying to destroy his toys ! Each of the 4 players controls a toy-car in the arena and must survive! 

Use your dash and your shield to survive and participate in the demise of your Friennemies !

Original Concept: Jeffry De Oliveira and Tanguy De Sousa

Developped with: Marco Bazaud, Jérémy Garceau, Quentin Fontanel, Camille Cianfarani

4 players Local Versus. You will need 4 gamepads and preferably 4 players !

The first level is meant to pick a vehicle and a color ! After that, enjoy the battle !

Théodule is not meant to be commercialy distributed.

We do not own the songs used in the game. They were all made by the very talented Smooth McGroove ! Please visit his YouTube Channel for more of his awesome work  !  -  https://www.youtube.com/user/SmoothMcGroove

We do not own the menu music. It is the main theme from Animal Crossing: Wild World. Credits to these awesome artists !
